original_text: In the twenty-seventh year of Jeroboam king of Israel, Azariah the son of Amaziah, king of Judah, began to reign.
korean_text: 이스라엘 왕 여로보암 제이십칠년에 유다 왕 아마샤의 아들 아사랴가 왕이 되니

sentences.original_text: In the twenty-seventh year of Jeroboam king of Israel,
Azariah the son of Amaziah, king of Judah,
